workflow_description: Test MCP UI automation by opening Notepad and typing text

tool_args.run: console.log('Launching Notepad...'); await desktop.openApplication('notepad'); await sleep(2000); console.log('Notepad launched'); return { success: true };

console.log('Looking for Notepad...'); const apps = await desktop.applications(); const notepad = apps.find(a => a.name.toLowerCase().includes('notepad') || a.name.toLowerCase().includes('untitled')); if (notepad) { console.log('Found Notepad, activating...'); await notepad.activateWindow(); await sleep(1000); console.log('Typing text...'); await desktop.typeText('Hello from MCP v0.16.3!'); await desktop.pressKey('{Enter}'); await desktop.typeText('UI Automation is working!'); return { success: true }; } else { return { error: 'Notepad not found' }; }
